author: Reem Haqqi
title: Manhunt For 'Lone Hiker' Dad After 3 Daughters Found Dead, Man's Blood Found At Campsite, And Mom Breaks Silence
text:
Whitney Decker called the police when her three daughters didn‚Äôt come back from a planned visitation with their dad.
It was May 30, and their dad, Travis Decker, was supposed to return them after the scheduled visit. But he didn‚Äôt show up, and Whitney couldn‚Äôt get through to him.
She said his phone kept going straight to voicemail. Days later, on Monday afternoon, the girls were found dead at a campsite about 40 miles from their home in Wenatchee.
Their bodies were discovered at a campsite off a mountain trail Whitney Decker A sheriff‚Äôs deputy found the girls‚Äô bodies three days after they were supposed to return.
They were down an embankment at a campsite in the Cascade Mountains. It was just west of Leavenworth, not far from the Pacific Crest Trail.
Officials say the girls were suffocated and restrained Whitney Decker The autopsy later confirmed the girls were suffocated.
They‚Äôd been tied up with zip ties and had plastic bags placed over their heads, according to investigators.
Clues at the site pointed investigators toward their father Wenatchee Police Department At the campsite, police found Decker‚Äôs truck abandoned.
It had two bloody handprints on the tailgate. One blood sample at the scene belonged to a male, and another was from an animal.
Decker‚Äôs dog was also found alive and taken to the humane society.
A possible sighting has fueled an ongoing manhunt Chelan County Sheriff‚Äôs Office Decker still hasn‚Äôt been found, but authorities believe they might have seen him.
A group of hikers spotted a man acting strangely in the Enchantments area. He looked unprepared and seemed to be avoiding people.
Later, a helicopter saw a solo hiker near Colchuck Lake. He ran the moment the helicopter passed over.
Teams have been searching forests, trails, and backcountry areas Embed from Getty Images
Tracking dogs picked up a trail near Ingalls Creek Trailhead on Highway 97.
Authorities say they‚Äôve searched hundreds of square miles, covering mountains, water, and remote terrain.
Chelan County Sheriff‚Äôs Office is still leading the criminal case, but they‚Äôve handed over search operations to federal teams for now.
Decker‚Äôs military experience and survival skills are a challenge Whitney Decker Decker‚Äôs background is making the search harder.
He served in the Army from 2013 to 2021, including time in Afghanistan and the 75th Ranger Regiment.
Officials say he knows how to navigate, survive outdoors, and even live off the grid. He once stayed in the wilderness for two and a half months.
Before the murders, Decker searched for ways to move to Canada Facebook | Travis Decker Right before this happened, Decker had looked up how to relocate and work in Canada.
He‚Äôs now facing a federal charge for fleeing to avoid prosecution.
The mother is pushing to fix the Amber Alert system Facebook | Katle Vogel Whitney Decker believes an earlier Amber Alert could have changed the outcome.
‚ÄúShe‚Äôs very serious about pushing for changes,‚Äù her attorney Arianna Cozart said.
Whitney wants to make sure the alert system works better in future cases.
Police are asking the public not to approach the suspect Facebook | Whitney Decker Authorities say Decker is dangerous and might be armed. They‚Äôve urged everyone not to approach him.
‚ÄúPlease secure your homes and vehicles, stay alert, and report any suspicious activity to 911.‚Äù
If you think you‚Äôve seen him, call it in immediately and don‚Äôt try to make contact.

author: @beneyto98
title: No es un error: este fin de semana llueve y necesitaremos estas botas de agua Hunter (ahora rebajadas en El Corte Ingl√©s)
text: Damos la bienvenida a septiembre con un temporal de tormenta. Aunque quisiera quedarme en casa, mis obligaciones me llaman y solo queda pensar en el look que me voy a poner para la ocasi√≥n. Debemos pensar que, aunque llueva, todav√≠a no hacer fr√≠o. As√≠ que voy a optar por un look de verano, pero es inevitable no combinarlo con unas botas Hunter. Sobre todo, quiero mantener mis pies secos. Botas de agua Hunter He buscado en El Corte Ingl√©s porque preve√≠a que algunos de los modelos ya estar√≠an en rebajas. Por suerte, he acertado. Las botas Hunter que he encontrado son muy c√≥modas y cuentan con una suela de cu√±a. Estas son de color negro y de ca√±a alta. Unas botas que se ajustan a la perfecci√≥n a nuestros pies y son de caucho completamente con suela de goma. Un dise√±o ic√≥nico que lleva a√±os arrasando y que ofrece una silueta din√°mica que aporta mucha versatilidad. Podemos completar el look con un vestido corto o con otras prendas m√°s urbanas como unos [pantalones en tendencia](https://www.trendencias.com/propuestas-y-consejos/pantalones-tendencia-esta-temporada-otono-invierno-2023-elegante-satinado-al-arriesgado-vaquero-mega-roto) y una camiseta con estampado. Son impermeables y los d√≠as que tengamos que ir a la [oficina](https://www.trendencias.com/shopping/como-vestir-oficina-verano-ropa-calzado-accesorios) y est√© lloviendo ser√°n nuestras mejores aliadas. El precio de las botas en El Corte Ingl√©s es [100 euros](https://www.trendencias.com/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.elcorteingles.es%2Fmoda-mujer%2FMP_0030841_WFT2007RMAATM-botas-de-agua-de-mujer-de-cana-alta-en-color-negro%2F%3FparentCategoryId%3D999.39073040013%26color%3DNegro&category=shopping&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=632029) (antes 125 euros) Nota: Algunos de los enlaces de este art√≠culo son afiliados y pueden reportar un beneficio econ√≥mico a Trendencias. En caso de no disponibilidad, las ofertas pueden variar. Fotos | [@hunterboots](https://www.instagram.com/p/C-p0YictHhG/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==), El Corte Ingl√©s En Trendencias | [Sandalias Birkenstock: manual de estilo, dise√±os ic√≥nicos y looks s√∫per inspiradores para lucirlas m√°s all√° del verano](https://www.trendencias.com/shopping/sandalias-birkenstock-manual-estilo-disenos-iconicos-looks-inspiradores-para-lucirlas-alla-verano) En Trendencias | [C√≥mo vestir para un bautizo: vestidos, zapatos y accesorios](https://www.trendencias.com/shopping/como-vestir-para-bautizo-vestidos-zapatos-accesorios) En Trendencias | [S√≥nar 2025: todos los conciertos, entradas y horarios confirmados](https://www.trendencias.com/festivales/sonar-todos-conciertos-entradas-horarios-confirmados).

author: Anna
title: Comment on Everyday Chocolate Chip Cookies by Anna
text:
Everyday Chocolate Chip Cookies are soft, chewy, and so delicious! Made with brown butter, they‚Äôre extra flavorful. Kids and adults love these chewy chocolate chip cookies!
Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipe
Like many bakers, I‚Äôve been searching for the perfect chocolate chip cookie recipe for years now! And finally, after months of testing and tweaking, my search is over! Because these cookies are the total package!
Best Chocolate Chip Cookies
Here‚Äôs what I love so much about these cookies:
- They‚Äôre made with basic ingredients most people have in their kitchens all of the time. No crazy expensive or hard to find ingredients for this recipe!
- The method is straightforward. Meaning bakers of all levels can bake these cookies! Yay!
- Brown Butter!!! AKA liquid gold. AKA my secret to the best chocolate chip cookies! And if you‚Äôve never made brown butter before, don‚Äôt fret. It‚Äôs so easy and anyone can do it!
- No chilling the cookie dough! Although you do have to chill the butter. But once that‚Äôs done, you can roll and bake!
- They bake up thick, chewy, and exploding with gooey chocolate chips!!! And Did I mention the crispy edges and soft centers? Ooooooh, and the daintiest hint of sea salt that gives enough pop for developed palates but doesn‚Äôt freak out toddlers!? Yeah. It‚Äôs all there.
How to make Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
- butter: salted or unsalted butter will work. If you use unsalted, just add a tiny extra pinch of salt to the dry ingredients.
- all purpose flour: flour absorbs the wet ingredients. Just be sure not to pack the flour into the measuring cup. And I don‚Äôt suggest using whole wheat or any other type of flour for this recipe.
- baking soda: gives the cookies a nice little puff so that they‚Äôre not completely flat.
- sea salt: a small amount balances out the other flavors. If you don‚Äôt have sea salt, table salt will work.
- white granulated sugar and brown sugar: brown sugar makes the cookies moist and chewy, while the granulated sugar helps the cookies spread. I prefer dark brown sugar, but light brown will work.
- vanilla extract: enhances all of the other flavors in the cookies.
- eggs: add flavor, structure, and height to the cookies. Make sure your eggs are at room temperature before adding them to the cookie dough.
- and chocolate chips: I like using a combination of milk chocolate, semi-sweet chocolate, and dark chocolate chips. But you can really play around here! I‚Äôve used all one variety. And I‚Äôve even added white chocolate and peanut butter chips! Just don‚Äôt skimp on the amount! Use 2 and 1/2 cups.
Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipe
- The first step is melting and browning the butter. Place the butter in a small saucepan and melt the butter. Continue cooking until the butter is lightly browned, and smells slightly nutty. Remove from heat and scrape the butter into a heatproof bowl. Place the bowl in the refrigerator and bring the butter back to room temperature. This will take about 2 hours! If you chill it longer than that, you may need to soften the butter a bit. You want it solid, but soft enough that when you gently press it with your finger it leaves an indentation. It‚Äôs so important that your butter is at the proper temperature before you begin baking. If it‚Äôs too warm, your cookies will bake up flat and spread all over the pan
- Once your butter is ready, it‚Äôs time to bake! Unlike most recipes where you preheat oven to 350, you‚Äôll actually want to preheat the oven to 375 degrees (F).
- Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside.
- In a large bowl whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Set these dry ingredients aside until needed.
- In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat the brown butter and sugars until light and fluffy. Add in the vanilla and beat smooth. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. You can also use a large bowl and electric mixer for this step.
- Turn the mixer off and fold in the dry ingredients and chocolate chips.
- Roll cookie dough into balls. I like to make the cookie dough balls pretty big, about 3 or 4 tablespoons. But you can make them any size you want. Just adjust the time according to the size of your cookies. Big cookies will need more time to bake, while smaller cookies will need less.
- Place them on the prepared baking sheet and bake! About 10 to 11 minutes should do it! You‚Äôll know the cookies are done when they‚Äôre golden brown at the edges but still soft in the middle. Let cookies cool for 10 minutes on the baking sheet before transferring to a wire racks to cool completely.
Pro Tip: If you‚Äôd like your chocolate chip cookies to look like the ones you see in my photos, simply press a few chocolate chips on top of each cookie right after they come out of the oven. You can also sprinkle them with sea salt! I love
Maldon sea salt because it‚Äôs flaky and delish.
We brought these chocolate chip cookies to our beach house a few weeks ago and the kids (and adults!) finished them in a matter of hours. These chocolate chip cookies are teenager, toddler, and mother-in-law approved‚Ä¶ and that is, well, that‚Äôs saying a lot! They‚Äôre so good with a big glass of milk! But you can also use them to make homemade ice cream sandwiches!
More Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipes:
The Most Wonderful Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies Ever S‚Äômores Chocolate Chip Cookies Peanut Butter Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies Bite-Sized Brown Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies Soft Batch Double Chocolate Fudge Cookies
Everyday Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients
- 14 tablespoons salted butter
- 2 and 1/3 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon flaky sea salt
- 1 cup + 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar, packed
- 1/2 cup granulated sugar
- 2 teaspoons vanilla
- 2 large eggs, at room temperature
- 1 cup milk chocolate chips
- 1 cup dark chocolate chips
- 1/2 cup bittersweet chocolate chips
Instructions
- Place the butter in a small sauce pan over medium-high heat and cook for about 2 minutes - stirring almost constantly - until the butter has completely melted and lightly browned. Remove from heat and scrape butter (and any brown specks) into a heatproof bowl. Place the bowl in the refrigerator and bring the butter back to room temperature; this will take about an hour to an hour and a half.
- Once the butter is at room temperature...
- Preheat oven to 375 degrees (F). Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside.
- In a medium sized bowl whisk together the flour, baking soda, and sea salt; set aside.
- In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, add the chilled brown butter and both sugars; beat on medium speed for about 2 minutes, or until light and fluffy. Add in the vanilla and beat smooth. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Turn the mixer off.
- Gently fold in the flour mixture with a wooden spoon, stirring only until the flour begins to disappear. Fold in chocolate chips.
- Roll 3 tablespoon sized balls of dough between your palms to form a ball (they should be big; almost a 1/4 cup), then place on prepared sheet (make sure to leave enough room in between each cookie for inevitable spreading). Continue this process until all the dough has been rolled. Place baking sheets in preheated oven - one at a time - and bake for 10 to 11 minutes, or until golden at the edges but still soft in the middle. Let cookies cool for 10 minutes on the sheet before transferring to a wire wrack to cool completely.
@Bakerbynatureand by using the hashtag #BakerByNature

author: Alexandra Skores
title: GasBuddy sees gas prices dropping 13 cents a gallon across the U.S. next year
text:
Your buck is likely to take you on a little farther road trip next year. At least that‚Äôs the outlook from Patrick De Haan , GasBuddy‚Äôs head of petroleum analysis and one of the most cited experts on gasoline prices.
Advertisement De Haan is predicting a 13 cents a gallon drop in regular unleaded gas prices nationwide next year, along with the usual seasonal ups and downs seen every spring and summer. His 2023 prediction fell short by only 2 cents ‚Äî $3.49 a gallon versus $3.51 in actuality.
Advertisement ‚ÄúThose seasonal trends are very well established,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúBut all in all, we expect a modest improvement.‚Äù

author: Sara Castellanos
title: La ruta de senderismo que tienes que hacer s√≠ o s√≠ en Almer√≠a: un oasis en medio de karts por el nacimiento de un r√≠o
text:
La ruta de senderismo que tienes que hacer s√≠ o s√≠ en Almer√≠a: un oasis en medio de karts por el nacimiento de un r√≠o
Un enclave inesperado en pleno paisaje semides√©rtico sorprende por su riqueza vegetal y su caudal cristalino. Esta ruta corta, pero impactante, se ha convertido en un secreto a voces entre los senderistas
Entre ca√±ones de yeso y paisajes semides√©rticos, se esconde una ruta de senderismo que sorprende por su contraste: un peque√±o para√≠so verde repleto de vegetaci√≥n, agua cristalina y fauna √∫nica. Este recorrido es ideal para los amantes de la naturaleza que buscan una experiencia diferente en el coraz√≥n de la provincia, donde el terreno √°rido se transforma en un inesperado oasis. Su f√°cil acceso y baja dificultad t√©cnica lo convierten en una opci√≥n perfecta tanto para senderistas expertos como para quienes desean iniciarse en este tipo de actividades al aire libre.
[@rociojusta]Los molinos de R√≠o aguas - üìçAlmer√≠a Un peque√±o oasis üòåü•∞ Un sendero muy bonito para ir en familia.üòåüèæ[#almeriaüåÖ][#naturaleza][#almeriavibes][#almeriaisdifferent][#senderismo][#senderoalmeria][#almeriaconagua][#nature][#andalucia][#verano][#almeriaexiste][#rioaguas][‚ô¨ Soso - Kabusa Oriental Choir]
Se trata del sendero de Los Molinos del R√≠o Aguas, en pleno karst en Yesos de Sorbas, uno de los enclaves m√°s peculiares y fr√°giles de Andaluc√≠a. La ruta, de tipo circular y unos 3 kil√≥metros de longitud, parte desde la peque√±a aldea llamada Los Molinos del R√≠o Aguas. A lo largo del recorrido, el caminante atraviesa huertos tradicionales, t√∫neles naturales de vegetaci√≥n, pasarelas de madera y formaciones rocosas √∫nicas, hasta llegar al cartel que marca el nacimiento del r√≠o Aguas. A pesar de que su caudal ha disminuido dr√°sticamente por la sobreexplotaci√≥n del acu√≠fero, sigue siendo una fuente vital de biodiversidad y un ejemplo claro del valor ecol√≥gico de la zona.
Vegetaci√≥n exuberante y fauna protegida
Este espacio natural destaca por su singularidad: en medio de un terreno seco y quebrado, aparece un humedal con adelfas, carrizos, juncos y √°lamos blancos que forman corredores vegetales por donde discurre el sendero. El entorno da cobijo a especies como el gal√°pago leproso, la √∫nica tortuga de agua dulce aut√≥ctona del sureste peninsular, y a numerosas aves propias de ecosistemas h√∫medos. A medida que se asciende entre rocas erosionadas y se cruzan pasarelas de ca√±averales, el paisaje se transforma en un escenario casi m√°gico que sorprende por su riqueza y contraste.
[@vicky.dominguez10]Ruta por los molinos del R√≠o AguasüëåüèΩ[#Senderismo][#Almeria][#Sorbas][#Nacimiento][#trekinglover][#Agua][#Tortugas][‚ô¨ Beautiful Nature - Steven Solveig]
Antes de concluir la visita, merece la pena acercarse a las pozas del r√≠o Aguas, situadas al otro extremo de la aldea. En ellas es posible observar tortugas nadando lentamente o descansando al sol. Esta ruta, adem√°s de ser una caminata agradable, invita a reflexionar sobre el impacto humano en entornos naturales delicados. Aunque la caminata completa no supera la hora de duraci√≥n, su valor paisaj√≠stico, ecol√≥gico y cultural la convierte en una de las rutas imprescindibles que hay que hacer s√≠ o s√≠ en Almer√≠a.
Entre ca√±ones de yeso y paisajes semides√©rticos, se esconde una ruta de senderismo que sorprende por su contraste: un peque√±o para√≠so verde repleto de vegetaci√≥n, agua cristalina y fauna √∫nica. Este recorrido es ideal para los amantes de la naturaleza que buscan una experiencia diferente en el coraz√≥n de la provincia, donde el terreno √°rido se transforma en un inesperado oasis. Su f√°cil acceso y baja dificultad t√©cnica lo convierten en una opci√≥n perfecta tanto para senderistas expertos como para quienes desean iniciarse en este tipo de actividades al aire libre.
Almer√≠a

author: The Straits Times
title: Perrier ordered to remove water filters
text:
VERGEZE, France - French authorities ordered Nestle on May 7 to stop filtering its Perrier and held back on allowing the under-pressure brand from using the description ‚Äònatural mineral water‚Äô.
The government prefect for the southern Gard region, where Perrier is extracted and bottled, said however the product was not a risk to consumers.
But having to remove the filtering system within two months was a new blow for its owner Nestle Waters, which has said that at the peak of its popularity sold nearly one billion bottles a year in 140 countries around the world.
The Swiss food and drinks conglomerate has been under pressure for some time over Perrier and other brands as EU regulations strictly limit what treatments are allowed for any product marketed as natural mineral water.
Nestle Waters said in a statement that it would comply with the order to stop microfiltering and that was ‚Äúdetermined to seek solutions‚Äù that would allow the prefect to renew authorisation to use the ‚Äònatural mineral water‚Äô description.
Authorities said a decision on whether Perrier can be considered ‚Äònatural mineral water‚Äô would be made by Aug 7.
Following complaints by consumer groups, a French magistrate in 2025 launched a fraud inquiry into Nestle and rival bottler Sources Alma over suspicions of illegal processing of mineral waters that command a premium price.
In 2024, Nestle Waters admitted using banned filters and ultra-violet treatment on mineral waters, which must be processed naturally by law.
It paid a ‚Ç¨2 million (S$2.93 million) fine to avoid legal action over the use of illegal water sources and filtering.
It said at the time though that the replacement filters were approved by the government and that its water is ‚Äúpure‚Äù.
However, regional health authority experts judged the micro filtering system in place did not comply with regulations, prompting May 7‚Äôs order.
The possibility that the government may have turned a blind eye to illegal filtering practices has been under investigation by a French senate committee following media reports that the prime minister‚Äôs office and president‚Äôs office had in 2023 recommended letting Nestle carry on with the micro filtering despite official warnings.
France‚Äôs former director-general of health, Mr Jerome Salomon, had called for the suspension of Nestle‚Äôs operations permit at its sites that produce Vittel and other brands in the Vosges region of eastern France and Perrier at Vergeze in the southern Gard region.
President Emmanuel Macron has denied giving in to lobbying by the Swiss food giant.
‚ÄúOne illegal treatment has been replaced by another. The government, which had approved Nestle Waters‚Äôs transformation plan, is heavily at fault,‚Äù said socialist Senator Alexandre Ouizille, who is leading the Senate investigation which is due to be published on May 19.
Foodwatch, one of the consumer groups that had spoken out publicly about the practices of bottlers, said on May 7 ‚Äúthis decision goes in the right direction‚Äù and expressed hope that the investigation underway will ‚Äúshed complete light on the actions committed by the multinational and its executives‚Äù. AFP

author: Anton
title: Jung Myung-seok / Providence
text:
Jung Myung-seok
December 22, 2023: Jeong Myeong-seok ‚Äî a South Korean religious sect leader whose sex crimes were featured in the popular Netflix series In the Name of God: A Holy Betrayal ‚Äî was
sentenced to 23 years in prison.
Jeong, who refers to himself as Messiah, was found guilty of sexual violence against three of his female followers. He is the founder of the Christian Gospel Mission, also known as Providence or Jesus Morning Star (JMS).
Future grim for cult leader convicted of sex crimes: experts‚Äì Jeong Myeong-seok unlikely to be successful in reversing court ruling, experts assess, Park Jun-Hee, The Korea Herald, December 28, 2023. Also at [Archive.Todayand the WayBackMachine]
Jeong Myeong-seok, the leader of a controversial religious group, Jesus Morning Star, lodged an appeal on a court ruling last week sentencing him to 23 years behind bars for sexual assault and molestation.
However, the future looks grim for Jeong, as legal experts on Thursday said it is highly unlikely that the 78-year-old will succeed in reversing the Daejeon District Court‚Äôs ruling in the appellate court due to the trustworthiness of the victims‚Äô testimony and evidence.
‚ÄúThe court got the facts right through the victims‚Äô testimonies and evidence, all of which are reliable and trustworthy, so the appellate court would likely uphold the initial ruling,‚Äù Jeong Woong-seok, a law professor at Seo Kyeong University and chairman of the Korean Society of Criminal Procedure Law, told The Korea Herald.
‚ÄúUnless it finds a new piece of evidence that could overturn the result, a victory for Jeong will not happen,‚Äù the professor noted.
The leader was convicted of routinely raping and sexually assaulting a number of his female followers, including one from Hong Kong, one from Australia and one from South Korea, between February 2018 and September 2021. [‚Ä¶more‚Ä¶]
Jung Myung-seok [sometimes written as ‚ÄòJong Myong Suk‚Äô of ‚ÄòJohn Myung Seok‚Äô] is the leader of a religious movement considered to be, theologically, a
[cult of Christianity](/c45.html). Sociologically the movement is a cult as well. [ 1](#note-416-1)
Officially his name is Jung, Myung-Seok (i.e. given name Myung-Seok, family name Jung). He is also known as Joshua Jung, Joshua Lee Jung, Joshua Lee, Pastor Joshua and JMS. News reports point out that the initials JMS‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶coincidentally ‚Äî or perhaps not ‚Äî are the same as ‚ÄúJesus Morning Star,‚Äù a reference to Revelations 2:24-29, in which Jesus promises believers, ‚ÄúHe shall rule them with a rod of iron . . . and I will give him the morning star.‚Äù
‚Äì Source:
[‚ÄúLove‚Äô cult snares students], The Japan Times, Japan, Oct. 27, 2002
Within the movement, followers of Jung are called Morning Stars (MS or MSes).
While many Koreans have English names, Myung Seok does not translate to Joshua. We are told that ‚Äú[h]is choice of Joshua was probably because he relates himself to Joshua of the OT leading the Israelites into the Promised Land. He claims this history is repeating on a large scale.‚Äù The same research also states that ‚Äú[h]is name usually isn‚Äôt given initially to potential members because they don‚Äôt want to give them the opportunity to research for themselves.‚Äù
Providence
Jung‚Äôs movement, Providence, was founded in South Korea. In Japan, the group is known as ‚ÄòSetsuri,‚Äô the Japanese word for ‚Äòprovidence.‚Äô
The movement uses (or has used) various names, including International Christian Association (ICA), Christian Gospel Mission (CGM), and Jesus Morningstar Church (JMS), Morning Star Church, or American Providence.
However, each church that follows Jung‚Äôs teaching keeps its own name (e.g. Nak-seong-dae Church, Seoul Church, etcetera).
JMS uses the following front groups to attract potential recruits:
- Bright Smile Movement (BSM)
- China Christian Youth Association (CCYA)
- Global Association of Culture and Peace (GACP)
- International Cultural Exchange (ICE)
- International Culture Interchange Association (ICIA)
- IOCA
- IOCA Modeling
- Korean International Cultural Society (KICS)
- Peace Model Korea (PMK)
- Peace Model USA (PMUSA)
- Providence Vision Project (PVP)
- Sky Soccer
- United Culture and Arts Network (UCAN)
- VIA 3
- World Peace Model
- Youth Developer Group (YDG)
Seok the Messiah
In his youth, Jung Myung-seok was a member of the Unification Church, the
[cult of Christianity](/c45.html) founded and operated by Sun Myung Moon. When he started his own religious movement Jung, like Moon, also claimed to be the Messiah.
Jong, age 57, is said to have joined the
[Unification Church]in his teens, but left to establish his own religion around 1980. It now claims 150,000 adherents in Korea and from the late 1980s also began making inroads in Japan, where it has attracted more than 1,000 members. Recruitment activities typically take place on college campuses, through infiltration of sports clubs and other extracurricular circles.
‚ÄúThe church‚Äôs doctrine is composed of the so-called ‚Äú30 precepts,‚Äô although it‚Äôs pretty clear that they‚Äôre derived from the Unification Church,‚Äù explains Toyoshige Aizawa, a Christian minister engaged in weaning young people away from cults.
‚ÄúJong has twisted the biblical story of Adam and Eve to deal with sex, saying, ‚ÄúTo atone for Adam and Eve‚Äôs original sin, which was visited upon all mankind, it‚Äôs necessary to engage in intercourse with the Lord.‚Äô In this case, he means himself, since he claims to be a reincarnation of Jesus.‚Äù
‚Äì Source:
[‚ÄúLove‚Äô cult snares students], The Japan Times, Japan, Oct. 27, 2002
The JMS 30 lesson Bible course is almost identical to billionaire Sun Myoung Moon‚Äôs ‚ÄúDivine Principles,‚Äù the Bible course of his Unification Church, the difference being which leader each course identifies as the Messiah. In his teens, Jeong was reportedly a follower of Moon; undoubtedly, that is where he learnt claiming to be God can be profitable.
The English 30 lessons never give Jeong‚Äôs full name. He is referred to as ‚ÄúOur founder‚Äù or ‚ÄúR,‚Äù short for rabbi, ironic since Jeong has praised Hitler. On English websites he is called either Joshua Jung or Joshua Lee. Students taking this course are never allowed to take the materials home with them. This control of information makes it harder for students to reflect critically on the material.
JMS events are also designed to promote sleep deprivation, which aids in the indoctrination process by impairing critical thinking skills. There are 4am daily dawn services and overly long weekend services and events: sometimes all night, sometimes all day, sometimes both.
‚Äì Source: Peter Daley, Jung Myung Seok: How to Spot a Woolly Wolf, Keimyung Gazette, Keimyung University, South Korea, Feb. 1, 2006
The ‚ÄúProvidence‚Äù movement of Joshua Jung rests heavily upon two principal beliefs: that 2000 years ago, the work and message of
[Jesus Christ]were not complete, and that we now live in a new time period that requires a new understanding of scripture and a new ‚ÄúLord‚Äù.
This second point is significant in that it gives license to Jung to reinterpret any aspect of traditional teaching by labeling it as newly inspired revelation. Many terms such as ‚Äúresurrection‚Äù and ‚Äúborn again‚Äù take on new meaning based upon his interpretations and his new understanding of the bible‚Äôs figurative language.
However, it is the first point that flies in the face of sound biblical doctrine. Jung teaches that the salvation message of Jesus was incomplete, having been interrupted through man‚Äôs interference and subsequent crucifixion of Christ. Because of this, he teaches that we cannot truly experience the ‚Äúbetter‚Äù resurrection unless we follow the new revelation of his teachings.
[‚Ä¶]
[T]he teachings of Joshua Jung go far beyond doctrinal differences. His proclamation that he is the ‚ÄúLord of the Second Coming‚Äù is blasphemous. His insistence that the bible is to be interpreted through his teaching because he alone is the ‚Äúone who receives Jesus‚Äô spirit, power, mission and heart‚Äù is blasphemous. His belief that believers are to ‚Äúget out of a literal understanding of the Bible‚Äù is dangerous and makes one vulnerable to any man‚Äôs interpretation.
‚Äì Source:
[Providence Teachings], Providence Cult Watch
Convicted of rape
Controversy has followed Jung Myung-seok since at least 1999 when he fled Korea with a lawsuit pending against him. He was formally charged in 2001, and became an international fugitive in 2002:
Jung, who established the cult nearly three decades ago, has been wanted by both Interpol and the South Korean government since 1999 after rape allegations became public, according to several Asian newspaper reports.
Jung was formally charged with rape in 2001, and was captured in Hong Kong in 2003, but posted his own bail and avoided South Korean extradition charges. His whereabouts have been unknown since then, although he is rumored to be hiding in China, according to Peter Daley, an English professor at South Korea‚Äôs Keimyung University and a dedicated critic of Jung who established an extensive Web site aimed at exposing GACP‚Äôs activities after his roommate became involved with the cult.
Since the allegations became public, numerous other women have come forward with similar accusations. According to July reports from Japanese newspaper Asahi Shimbun, more than 100 women have said they were sexually abused or raped by Jung under the pretense of religious purification.
‚ÄúThere is a history of abuse with this group,‚Äù Daley said. ‚ÄúSo many girls get raped by its leader.‚Äù
GACP is most active in Asian countries but has branches worldwide, Daley said. It concentrates its membership recruitment activities at elite universities, including the University of Tokyo, Kyoto University, Osaka University, National Taiwan University and, recently, UCSD.
‚ÄúMost of the former members I have spoken to encountered JMS on a university campus,‚Äù Daley stated in a February 2006 article in the Keimyung Gazette. ‚ÄúYounger girls are also targeted for recruitment.‚Äù
The cult seeks members, according to Asahi Shimbun, by organizing sporting events, modeling shows, dance shows and other activities before inviting participants to Bible study sessions, where they are subsequently influenced to accept cult teachings that declare Jung as the true messiah and regulate members‚Äô sleeping and eating patterns. Former members have said that the group engages in brainwashing and extensive secrecy, and uses fun activities to build trust with recruits before introducing them to Jung‚Äôs teachings.
‚Äì Source:
[Alleged Cult Sows Seeds Via Campus Event], The Guardian, University of California, San Diego, USA, Nov. 13, 2006
Jung Myung-seok was arrested in Hong Kong in 2003 for visa violations but later fled an extradition hearing. China
extradited him to Seoul in February 2008.
In August 2008 he was
http://www.religionnewsblog.com/22035/jung-myung-seok-8 to 6 years in prison.
Upon appeal, the cult leader was
jailed for 10 years in February 2009.
Research Resources on Jung Myung-seok and Providence
Websites
-
Exodus[Korean] This Korean-language site, AntiJMS.net, is operated by former followers of Jung Myung Seok.
-
The JMS Cult HomepageThis extensive site consists primarily of links to current and archived forums regarding Jung Myung Seok and his movement. The site is operated by Peter Daley, an English lecturer at South Korea‚Äôs Keimyung University and a dedicated critic of Jung.
-
Providence Cult WatchSubtitled, ‚ÄúA Biblical Examination Of The Teachings Of Joshua Jung & Providence‚Äù. Good overview of Jung‚Äôs teachings.
-
SetsuriCult expert [Steve Hassan](/h12.html)‚Äòs entry on Setsuri (note: Setsuri is the name by which the movement is officially known by in Japan).
News Archive
-
Jung Myung-seok / Providencenews archive at Religion News Blog
See Also
-
‚ÄòYour white skin arouses me‚Äô: Inside the sinister Hitler-loving Korean sex cult luring young Australian girls into being ‚Äòspiritual brides‚Äô for a serial rapist, Nelson Groom, Daily Mail, May 20, 2016
Article details
Jung Myung-seok
Related topic(s):
https://www.apologeticsindex.org/tag/jung-myung-seok, Providence

En fin, magufadas, lo normal.. mientras formen parte del adn pol√≠tico-socio-cultural.
[#1](c1#c-1) Estas sectas siempre est√°n disponibles para entrar en los negocios de verdad: nadie mejor que ellos para legitimizar y glorificar golpes de estado y dictadores genocidas como los que han propiciado el expolio en Espa√±a o la religi√≥n que alimenta con su irracionalidad la invasi√≥n de Palestina.
A mi me hace bastante gracia, ( por decirlo suavemente) cada vez que paso por la calle Almagro de Madrid por la puerta de un conjunto de edificios de la Iglesia que abarcan toda una enorme manzana y que probablemente este en el podium de los terrenos m√°s caros de todo Madrid. ¬øsabeis como se llama la congregaci√≥n que vive all√≠? Hermanitas de los pobres. Con dos ovarios.
Y empezaron con un establo!
Hay que desamortizar todos los bienes cuyo uso no sea el de templo para oficios reliosos o monasterios.
Las residencias de los curas, obispos y dem√°s deben estar a su nombre y pagar los impuestos correspondientes como persona f√≠sica.

No me hagas re√≠r.
Inmuebles para caridad ?
Por eso no pagan IBI ,ni IVA y muy probablemente esas monjas cobraban en negro.
Dec√≠a Saramago que la Iglesia solo ha servido para separar, quemar y torturar
Nunca para unir a la gente.
La Iglesia es el Gran Par√°sito de nuestra sociedad..
El problema no es solo De la Iglesia, sino tambi√©n de notarios y registradores que dan por buenas operaciones que a ninguno de nosotros nos aceptan. Y falta impulso de l Estado en la recuperaci√≥n‚Ä¶
